entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -13.7°C

Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
